document_data.name: Wine Sausage
document_data.mainbody: '''Wine sausages''' were a delicious and strongly [[mint]]-flavored [[sausage]] dish available in the town of [[Mosstone]] in [[Tethyr]].
document_data.History: Wine sausages were served at the [[Oak-Father's Boon]] inn in Mosstone. In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], [[Volothamp Geddarm]] mentioned the dish along with [[bowl of hares]] as some of the best offerings from the Boon.
